explanation: [0-0] On an airplane, a man places his hand on the red compartment door.

[0-6] The man closes the compartment door, the camera turns, and you can see the man wearing black clothes. As the shot pans left, you can see a woman with long hair, wearing a black top and white pants, lying on a red bed next to the man. She is drinking from a tall glass filled with wine. After taking a sip, she raises the glass, smiles, and looks at the camera.

[6-15] The shot then cuts to a man wearing a green top and blue pants, wearing an eye mask, sleeping in an airplane seat. Suddenly, he wakes up, raises his hand, and starts clapping. The man then removes his eye mask and looks for something. Finally, the man looks to the right, covers his mouth with his hand, widens his eyes, and expresses shock.
